Title: Relates to the definition of a clinical peer reviewer
Summary: Relates to the definition of a clinical peer reviewer by clarifying that such term shall be applicable for the entire utilization review and external appeal article and means either a physician or a health care professional with certain qualifications.
LawCode: Amd ยง4900, Pub Health L; amd ยง4900, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to the definition of clinical peer reviewer
